sentences.sContent: They're going to take my citizenship away.
sentences.sCn: 他们将夺走我的公民权。

sentences.sContent: "Give me the toy," he said softly, "or I'll take it away from you."
sentences.sCn: “给我玩具，”他轻声说道，“否则我就把它从你身边夺走。”

trans.tranOther: If you take something away from someone, you remove it from them, so that they no longer possess it or have it with them
